name: No Name Orange Roughy
author: CHRIS523
summary: I love orange roughy. This is a nameless recipe I just came up with using things I had on hand. It is made in a skillet, but no frying here. If you wish to omit the feta, create another distinct flavor by mixing 1/2 pound chopped mushrooms with the white wine and tomatoes.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes with liquid, chopped
¼ cup sliced black olives, drained
directions: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat
Stir in green onions, and cook until tender, 5 to 10 minutes
Mix white wine and tomatoes with the green onions, and bring to a boil
Place orange roughy fillets in the white wine mixture
Season with basil, pepper, thyme, and rosemary
Reduce heat, and simmer 15 to 20 minutes, until fish is easily flaked with a fork
Sprinkle fish fillets with black olives and feta cheese
